this method is used to initialize the game.

this method is used to make the crack path.

this method is used to return a level template object for level creation.
makeRandomPointBetween(Point2D, Point2D, int) - Method in class FX.Model.Entities.Brick.Crack
this method is used to create a random point based on the direction provided.
MAX_CLONE_BALL - Static variable in class FX.Model.Entities.Ball.BallClone
this is the maximum ball allowed to be cloned.
Movable - Interface in FX.Model.Entities
this interface is used to allow a moving behavior for the entities.
move() - Method in class FX.Model.Entities.Ball.Ball
this method is used to move the ball (changing the variables to record where the ball is).
move() - Method in interface FX.Model.Entities.Movable
this is a method that is required to be implemented by the classes that have a moving behavior.
move() - Method in class FX.Model.Entities.Paddle
this method is used to move the paddle (player).
movementKeyHandler(ArrayList<KeyCode>) - Method in class FX.Controller.GameController
this method is used to get the user input and act accordingly based on the inputs provided in the array.
